1.title: Changing From the Inside Out
1.plot: Margena talks about the importance of mental health wellness and AD Dolphin speaks on getting fit from the inside out.

5.title: Keys to a Successful Life
5.plot: Omar Gooding star of "Family Ties," on Bounce TV. He is a actor, rapper, producer, writer and much more. Listen as he share keys to a success acting career.

6.title: Valentines Day Special
6.plot: How to fix a broken relationship with Dr. Ryeal Simms (Relationship Scientist) and Dr. Kiaundra Jackson (Relationship Therapist). How to fix a broken relationship?

1.title: Commercial Acting
1.plot: Mike Pointer from "Hey I saw your Commercial", talks about how coming from a music background, he got into the commercial acting, the learning process of becoming an actor and then becoming an acting coach. He talks about his coaching technique and how he prepares his actors for auditions.

2.title: The Doctor Said
2.plot: Dr. Mark Carter on what motivated him to become a doctor, his practice in Arizona and how he sets priorities in his life to balance his personal life and career.

3.title: Booking an Acting Gig
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Directing on a Budget
4.plot: Paul and Breeanna talk about their new movie "The Sale" and the Warner Bros. Premier. Justin, Breeanna, Kevin and Evan talk about their Christmas movie "The Christmas Cookie" and all the fun they had making it.

5.title: Because She Said So!
5.plot: Karen Y. McClain shares her acting journey and singing background with us and whats next for her. She also shares acting tips and ideas with actor David Harrington and musical tips on how to stand out and be different with Chavon Jackson.

6.title: She Sounds Like Aretha
6.plot: Cerissa McQueen shares her story, what kind of music inspires her. She performs one of her favorite songs with her band.

7.title: Hair and Skin Tips
7.plot: Makeup Artist, Marya Stokes, gives beauty tips on how to look natural and Lakisha Boyd, Skin Therapist, shares how she got started and how you can achieve the results you are looking for by keeping up a skin cleansing routine.

8.title: Life Through Faith
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: Girl Power with Zaina Juliette
9.plot: Zaina Juliette, singer/songwriter, talks about "The Girl Power movement" that she started as a little girl and how she includes it in her music to empower girls of all ages to be the best they can be.

10.title: Rochione E. Sanford Sr.
10.plot: Living on Purpose with Rochione E Sanford Sr.

11.title: The Beauty of the Congo
11.plot: Women from Congo share with us their life and they sing in their foreign language.

12.title: Producing Films in Hollywood
12.plot: Producer Hectorlyne Jarmon and Danae Jones share their story on partnering to make their new movie and how each of their strengths helped each other be better producers on this film and Raquel Davies, actress, shares her role in the film.

13.title: Actor Comedian Stacy Hall
13.plot: Stacy Hall tells us how he started his career at age 18 and what inspired him to become an actor after being a comedian.

14.title: Learning to Become Unlimited with Music
14.plot: MJ Shelby shares his musical journey, how his musical family influenced him, his favorite genres and the music he composes. Barney Brookes II talks about where he grew up and how his mom kept them busy by having them in church and playing music.

15.title: Life in the Fashion World
15.plot: Dymond Warren talks about how his journey in the fashion world started and teaches us how to mix and match with attitude to get the look you want saying confidence is the key to being trendy in fashion. Using a model, he also shares some of his fashion designs with us.

16.title: How Women are Empowering!
16.plot: Dr. Kalaki Clarke on what inspired her to become a doctor to help people and the inspiration her patients give her. Pamela Scott Johnson, Dean at California State Los Angeles, shares how important it is to know what the different colleges offer and what is available to you.

17.title: How to Stay Away From Danger
17.plot: Dangerman shares how to stay safe and paying attention to your surroundings, Being in the present moment is the first rule.

18.title: How You Can Live Unlimited
18.plot: Personal Trainer, Angela A. Brumfield, shares how important it is to eat healthy and making a lifestyle change. Actors Stevie Dreama, Donyae Murray, Jasmyn Loreal and Andre Edwards share how you can live a Life Unlimited and go after what you want to do in life.

19.title: How to be Successful
19.plot: Dominic Pace on what inspired him to become an actor and his experiences on all the different projects/actors he has worked with throughout his career. Money Vang explains the difference between graphics and computer graphics and how many movies are using this in film and how the process works and what inspired him to work in the visual/graphics effects side of things.

20.title: How Women Gain Control
20.plot: Women who are making their mark in the world.

21.title: The Latest in Hollywood
21.plot: Francesca Ellana and LaChele Steele talk about what it takes to be in entertainment and how important it is to look the best that you can look while building your brand and having people take you seriously.

22.title: Do You Need "Good News?"
22.plot: Apostle Venissa Jackson talking about the "Good News." As, you listen to Apostle Jackson unleash knowledge that will inspire you to reach your full potential.

23.title: Life in Radio Land
23.plot: Charley Sharp, Radio Personality, talks about his life as a DJ, how it all started and the many projects he is involved in as well as mentoring students. Guests from "Da Radio Show", MD and DunDee share how they got the show name, how they help launch their guests into the mainstream and the type of music they play.

24.title: How Can I Recover?
24.plot: Dr. McHaney, C.C.S.P. shares his personal journey of becoming a doctor and the challenges of treating his patients at his family practice, ranging from babies to seniors with mild to severe injuries.

1.title: Kids in the Spotlight
1.plot: Actors Conner Dean, Jax Malcolm, Cadence Kenion, and Chloe Noelle share their story and current projects.

2.title: Turning Bad into Good
2.plot: Byron Haskins talks about his world travels, living life as a model/actor, how he made his tattoos work for him , how he got the name "Mr. Never Sit Still". His daughters are his inspiration. He learned many lessons being in Prison and is a better person, it helps him to stay away from negativity and helps him live life unlimited. Eric B. Ramsey talks about his new film and what inspired him to write the story.

3.title: Change Can Change Your Life
3.plot: Rachelle L. Jones from Fabulux shares her story on how she almost died and came back to life; Arthur Coney, Marketing Director, teaches people how to have financial freedom just knowing how to use your money the right way; Sharrod Coleman from Alabama talks about his trip to LA to perform with his group "Sharrod Coleman and Chosen", his speaking engagements while in LA. and his ministry.

4.title: The Good News
4.plot: Apostle Vanissa Jackson bringing some good news, talks about her spiritual journey and coming to a city near you.

5.title: Tragedy into Triumph
5.plot: Veronica Loving talks about her book "Feeding a Monster" and how betrayed she felt on finding out her husband was a serial rapist; Georgette Todd, Give Big America, talks about her journey to writing her memoir "Foster Girl" and Argo Yusuf, from Angel Net talk about how they met and the journey to filming their new movie based on Georgette's story and a documentary to bring awareness about the foster care system.

6.title: Millennium Mash Up
6.plot: Christine Cooper talks about being on Dear White People and her upcoming projects; Christian Isaiah and his role on Shameless, his new Walgreens commercial and acting experiences; Eight year old Natalia Jackson talks about her Fashion Line dedicated to her fathers memory and her latest collection.

7.title: You are Unlimited
7.plot: Natasha Davis also known as Country Girl on how she got her nickname and her new music Calvin Jefferson talks about being a Tupac impersonator Just Faith talks about her music, challenges, her Album Music Box and working with her new band.

8.title: Men in Black
8.plot: "The Melody Trice Show" with special guest Thai Edwards: actor,model, celebrity trainer and Shawn Hazz McDonald: Actor, Model, Rap Artist also, Patrick Fauccet: Actor, Musician. The true "Men in Black."

9.title: Taking Advantage of Opportunity
9.plot: LeGrand Whitt on his 15 year career which includes The Apollo the Michael Jackson Record label and much more Jvonshay Lucci one of the top 10 Modeling Coaches in the World shares her 17 year journey and coaching experience working and teaching models how to walk etc in the Miss America Pageant and Miss USA pageants and many more Azlynn Berry Fashion Designer and National Face of Diva talks about her journey.

10.title: Skilled to Train
10.plot: RL Scott and Chyna McCoy talk about Family first Hollywood second and on working together in their new film Sheila Sarasmita shares about her career talks about her new short film project and Alana Walton started acting at 6 years old shares her story on acting and writing.

11.title: Actors Making a Difference
11.plot:

12.title: Kids on Fire!
12.plot: Nancy Fifita talks about how she got the name Fancy Nancy and her video and Jaiden2Fast on how he got started boxing and rapping.

13.title: Bouncing Back
13.plot: Brandon Magee TV Personality talks about playing professional football baseball weight lifting and Zachary Haven talks about his current movie Father Figures.

14.title: Girl Power
14.plot: Jessica Mikayla Adams talks about working on Super Soul Sunday and life as an actress.

15.title: Living Life Golden
15.plot: Stephanie Spruill from Spruill House Music talks about her new single and living life Golden.

16.title: Choices To Move Forward
16.plot: Nicholas Alexander on how he got into the arts industry after playing sports for many years and Taryn T. Francis talks about how it all began and Nick Thomas on how just a few years ago he took the plunge into acting and modeling and the challenges of battling yourself as your own worst critic.

17.title: Unlimited Opportunity
17.plot: Radio Personality Barry Bartlett on how he got to where he is now and Actress Lula on how she got her name and her new Lulu Kissable lipstick and Steven Russell Harts on how his music career got started.

18.title: Pageant Life
18.plot: Beauty Queens talk about how to live a Pageant Life.

19.title: How Did I Really Get Started
19.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

20.title: Women in Business
20.plot: Christina Cooper talks about her new makeup line and the new film she wrote and Leontine Abdullah talks about her show and how her clothing line got started.

21.title: Life As a Publicist!
21.plot: Publicists talk about what a publicists is and why you need one on your team.

22.title: The Total Woman
22.plot: Celebrity Shoe Designer Timi S talks about how TaDazzle Me got started and Eileen Amirian from Smolder Cosmetics shares her story on getting started and their inspirations.

23.title: Inspiring Teenagers
23.plot: Celebrity teens talk about their current projects where they get their inspiration and how they manage it all.

24.title: Arts and Fashion
24.plot: Perry White Celebrity FashionDesigner on how he started sewing clothes as a kid with his moms left over scraps and sold them at the swap meet, he was known as the kid that sewed clothes and what kept him motivated to keep moving forward and guest Paula Jai Parker and her son Onderful talk about how she started Pasadena Kids forum and teaches under privileged kids acting skills.

26.title: Entertainers Solution
26.plot: Tyrone Dubose R&B Historian Actor talks about his experience on UnSung on TVONE and Emilia MCarthy Actress talks about being on Disney shows and her musical Zombies on how the Zombies represent minorities and we should all celebrate peoples differences and how Disney is using Zombies to bring awareness.

27.title: Staying True to the Real You
27.plot: Diva Glammas Cast and Pynk Le'Monade Music Group.

28.title: The Long Hard Truth
28.plot: Karen Roberson and her all Male cast talk about her new monologue The Long Hard Truth.

29.title: Reality of Life
29.plot: Actor Bubba Ganter talks about Shakers and Young Retro and CEO of Untouchable Magazine.

1.title: Cierra Brooks Talks about Grand Hustle
1.plot: Cierra Brooks contestant on Grammy award-winning recording artist Tip "T.I" Harris' new and highly anticipated BET series The Grand Hustle.

2.title: Annie is Mac Funny!
2.plot: Annie McKnight talks about her nickname McFunny and the challenges she had to overcome of being a female comedian in a mans world.

3.title: Is It OK?
3.plot: Pastor Shep Crawford of the Experience Christian Ministries also well known in the music business as a 5 time Grammy Award winning R&B and Gospel producer song writer "Shep Crawford".

4.title: Action on the Move
4.plot: James Jurdi actor filmmaker talks about his new movie Danger One and Kazy Tauginas as Ari in The Equalizer 2 starring Denzel Washington and Hana Noka model actress and filmmaker talks about female empowerment.

5.title: Lia Grant Talks about the "Ex"
5.plot: Lia Grant from Bravo TV show "Your Husband is Cheating On Us" talks about him cheating.

6.title: Living Life Unlimited
6.plot: Special Guest: Josh Trovato former Hell's Kitchen contestant; Dara Renee' she is the star of new Disney Musical called Freaky Friday and Justin Cheadle former NFL player, now personal trainer discussing how he lost 100 lbs after the NFL.

7.title: Giving Back as a Young Artist
7.plot: Young artists share their stories on how they got started in the business and what it takes to keep going, staying motivated and giving back.

8.title: Priceless Living
8.plot: Listen as our guest discuss the importance of living their life. And, how they value those priceless moments.

9.title: Music is My Life
9.plot: Mahkenna Singer/Songwriter and female DJ at 17, shares her journey on how she got started and Keith Stewart, a singer/songwriter talks about living his best life.

10.title: Finding What Works
10.plot: Taja V. Simpson widely known for her role as the fun and sassy wife opposite of legendary Actor and Director Tyler Perry; in Lionsgate highly grossing film, "Tyler Perry's Boo2 shares her story. Dr. Christopher J. Metzler discuss with us about his involvement in politics of cannabis. He also discusses his new development using cannabis to help those dealing with illness.

11.title: How to Balance Being Single as an Artist
11.plot: John Montes and Cindy DeJagger as they share how to live as a single person and be successful in the entertainment industry.

12.title: Transforming Into the Best You
12.plot: Danielle Harvey, Athletic Trainer and a member of the LA Lingerie Football League, talks about living a healthy life through exercise and healthy eating.

13.title: Knowing Your Purpose as a Man
13.plot: Lewis Powell and Ro Brooks talk about their roles as "role models" in the industry and what it takes to make it happen.

14.title: Music Gives Me Life
14.plot: Music Artists Candace Wakefield, Patient Picasso and El-Jay talk about their current projects, their journey in the Music industry and what inspires them to live unlimited.

15.title: Make Holiday Desserts on a Budget
15.plot: Shavonne Cantrell shares how to make holiday treats on a budget.

imdb.plot outline: Melody Trice, Media Personality/ TV Host / Producer, is an inspirational life strategist. She likes to help others see that life truly can be unlimited. Melody believes when you have great examples of others who have accomplished what you desire to do, that will inspire you to look at your life and see that you too can become anything you want. Melody aspires to become the best in all she does. She enjoys acting and modeling. She knows her achievements can and will inspire others as they watch her on her path to living life unlimited. Melody's charisma takes people to a place where they can see their dreams really can come true. As you follow Melody on her journey to unleash endless possibilities, she hopes you are inspired and motivated to unleash your own creativity.
